1.0.name: wordpress/fluid-accessible-progressbar
1.0.description: Fluid Accessible Progressbar presents a progress-bar showing up when the button group controling the number of your blog's recent posts, recent comments and categories shown in an accordion is activated and uses the Fluid WAI-ARIA enabled progressbar and the JQuery WAI-ARIA enabled accordion and button. Use it in a wide widget area, like the "First Footer Widget Area" of the "Twenty Ten" theme.
